DOC.brief_summary: Central blood pressure and pulse wave velocity were measured using a Complior Analyse device before and immediately after the end of the dialysis session.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Hemodialysis Session on Vascular Stiffness
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study patients on maintenance hemodialysis at least 3 months stable dry weight singlepool Kt/V >1.4 no clinical cardiovascular disease during the 6 months preceding entry medical staff (medical doctors, nurses) not meet the above criteria episode of illness (for example: infection) pregnancy
